group_1.textRight: Wooow! No kiddin', your family's@HUUUGE! And they're, like, everywhere!
Reminds me of the [textRed:Azalea House!]

group_1.textLeft: You're right. It does take me back.

group_1.textRight: Everyone just hang on a sec, okay?@Dinner'll be served super quick!
Hey there, Himika's family! I'm Ayame!@How ya doin'?
You better behave yourselves until dinner!

group_1.textLeft: Ayame! You can't order other people's@families around like that!

group_1.textRight: It's no big deal, Konoha. They're all @used to it anyway!
Now...to start cooking! Here I go!

group_1.textLeft: Hey, what's this ingredient? What store@stocks this?

group_1.textRight: Huh, what IS it, I wonder? Just a bunch@of meat mixed together, I think.
It was just a lot of stuff they were@gonna throw out at the supermarket.
The guy who sold it to me was hanging@around the back of the shop.
I think he's the one in charge of throwing@out leftover food.
So I don't really know what it was@originally...
But hey, it was mega cheap!

group_1.textLeft: I-is that really all right?! Will you even@know what it tastes like?

group_1.textRight: I'd love to make something tasty, but@our family's dirt-poor.
This stuff is cheap enough that we can@get enough to feed everyone!
So that's how I get my hands on my@ingredients.
Once I've got them, I just have to use@all my strength to make it tasty!

group_1.textLeft: (She really doesn't have much at all in@the way of cookware, or spices...)

group_1.textRight: Let's see... This is...beef? And pork?
Both should be tasty with soy sauce and@butter, anyway.
Hm, not quite enough. Oh well, guess I'll@add something else.
Th-they're really shoveling it down!

group_1.textLeft: Hey! I was gonna eat that meat!

group_1.textRight: How was I supposed to know?! First one@to grab it wins, anyway!
(This dining table's like a battle ground!)
A-Ayame! Honestly...
(Still... Everyone looks so happy eating.@It's really nice...)
Hey, does your sister's cooking taste good?
Don't be rude!

group_1.textLeft: But really, I dunno how to answer.
She works super hard to make it, so it@can't be bad.

group_1.textRight: I KNOW it's tasty!

group_1.textLeft: I know it is too! I just said so, didn't I?

group_1.textRight: "She works super hard, so it's tasty"...

group_1.narration: Actually, back at the [textRed:Azalea House]...@The director always made us food.
It tasted so good, every single time.
I have no idea whether it'd stack up to@restaurant food or not.
But the director always worked hard to@make for our sakes.
How could it be anything but delicious@to us?
I see. I spent all that time worrying@about theory...
But did I ever once make food while@thinking about the people who would eat it?

group_1.textRight: Himika, we're going to head home now.@Thanks so much for the delicious meal.
I learned something very important today.

group_1.textLeft: Huh...? [chara:302001:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:302001:motion_400][chara:302001:cheek_0][chara:302001:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json][chara:302001:lipSynch_1]Oh, cool! I don't know what, but@I'm glad for you!
Whaaaaat? But I'm not done yet! I wanna@eat more! More, more!

group_1.textRight: That food's for Himika's family.@And, well...
You know, once we get home there'll@still be something delicious waiting.
